original_text: And he who sat there had the appearance of jasper and carnelian, and around the throne was a rainbow that had the appearance of an emerald.
korean_text: 앉으신 이의 모양이 벽옥과 홍보석 같고 또 무지개가 있어 보좌에 둘렸는데 그 모양이 녹보석 같더라

sentences.original_text: had the appearance of jasper and carnelian
sentences.korean_translation: 벽옥과 홍옥 같은 모습을 하고 계셨다

sentences.original_text: and around the throne was a rainbow
that had the appearance of an emerald
